messages.content:
Hey Landon hope your freshman year has been going well! My nameâs Eliel and Iâm a Rising Sophomore at Harvard studying Neurobiology. I'm the public service chair for the Black Men's Forum, Vice President of Club Flag Football, and a writer for the Harvard Crimson.  I am also a member of Harvard College Faith and Action, a Christian group on campus thatâs been a huge blessing in my life during my time at Harvard. I wanted to reach out to you to see if thereâs anything I can do to help make your transition into life at Harvard easier. If you have any questions about life on campus, anything related to extracurriculars or academics please let me know! I'd be more than happy to talk. If I can't answer your questions, I can link you with someone who would know more than me.  Hope to hear from you.
Just to let you know too, HCFA is having a pizza party this Friday September 1st at 6 p.m. in Ticknor lounge in Boylston Hall. Come thru get some free pizza and check out HCFA.
